Package main.java.coordinate

Class Triplet

java.lang.Object
main.java.coordinate.Triplet
public class Triplet extends Object
The Triplet class represents a three-dimensional vector or point with three coordinates (x, y, and z). It provides various mathematical operations and utility methods for working with 3D vectors.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    Triplet(double x, double y, double z)
    Constructs a new Triplet object with the specified initial coordinates.
